translations: 使（肌肉）内收（adduct 的第三人称单数）

sentences.sentence: Objective To develop a high throughput method of screening the binding site of DNA adducts.
sentences.translation: 目的探讨建立一种高通量的筛选DNA加合物结合位点的方法。

sentences.sentence: With the deepening research on etiology mechanism of tumour, people pay more and more attention to DNA adducts.
sentences.translation: 随着人们对肿瘤发病机制认识水平的不断深入，DNA加合物的研究也越来越受到重视。

sentences.sentence: The influence of dealcoholization mode on composition of spherical magnesium - alcohol adducts was investigated.
sentences.translation: 探讨了脱醇方式对球形醇镁加合物组成的影响。
